name: Kickin' London Broil with Bleu Cheese Butter
author: ROBYN050501
summary: London broil is grilled with spices and topped with a rich bleu cheese butter for an extraordinary taste! This is my original recipe - I hope you like it!
directions: Preheat the grill for low heat
In a bowl, mix the blue cheese, butter, and chives
In a separate bowl, mix the black pepper, garlic salt, onion powder, and cayenne pepper
Rub the steak with olive oil
Coat both sides of the meat with the spice mixture, and rub in by hand or press with a spatula
Place meat on the grill, and cook 10 to 15 minutes per side, or to desired doneness
Grill to rare or medium rare for best flavor
Remove from grill, and slice lengthwise into thin strips
Top with a large dollop of blue cheese butter, and serve
